Tamil Nadu District Details

Tamil Nadu, a South Indian state, is famed for its Dravidian-style Hindu temples

Tuticorin becoming India's most 'powerful' district.Kancheepuram has the highest per capita income. Tuticorin Kancheepuram is the best district in tamil nadu and high literate districts are kaniyakumari,chennai,thoothukodi and nilgiris are best for the education.
